name: Detailed Course on Straight Lines and Circles - JEE Mains and Advanced
description: In this course, Vineet Loomba will provide in-depth knowledge of Straight Lines and Circles. The course will be helpful for aspirants preparing for IIT JEE. Learners at any stage of their preparation will be benefited from the course. The course will be completed in approximately 34 days which comprises 14 classes with a duration of 90 minutes each. The course will be conducted in Hindi and notes will be provided in English.

value.title: Straight Lines - Part I: Coordinate Geometry and Angle between Two Lines
Straight Lines - Part II: Different Forms of Straight Lines
Straight Lines - Part III: Perpendicular Bisector and Distance between Parallel Lines
Straight Lines - Part IV: Locus and Equation to Locus
Straight Lines - Part V and Doubt Clearing
Straight Lines - Part VI: Image of a Point and Foot of Perpendicular and Rotation of Axis
Straight Lines - Part VII: Pair of Straight Lines and Homogenisation
Circles - Part I: Definitions and Equation of Circle with Typical Conditions
Circles - Part II: Position of a Point, Intersection of Line, and Circle
Circles - Part III: Chord of Contact and Doubt Clearing
Circles - Part IV: Director Circle and Different Cases of Two Circles
Circles - Part V: Family of Circles and Radical Axis
Circles Part VI: Pair of Tangents and Common Chords

author.bio: A game-changer in Mathematics, produced 100 percentilers in 2021/2022/2023, his courses are regarded as the Benchmark for IIT JEE aspirants.
